text: Va haroina, ʙa Muso kitoʙi Tavrot dodem, hamcunon ki ʙa tu Qur'onro dodem, pas dar on qavmi u ixtilof kardand, ʙa'zejason imon ovardand va ʙa'zejason kofir sudand. Va agar naʙud on kalimae, ki Parvardigorat pes gufta ʙud, haroina, mijonason kor ʙa pojon meomad. Va alʙatta, hanuz musrikon dar sakku suʙhai saxtand az Qur'on
